Trade/Device Name(s): GEN-PROBE APTIMA Assay for Neisseria gonorrhoeae
Regulation Name(s): Neisseria spp. direct serological test reagents
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Target amplification nucleic acid probe test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GEN-PROBE APTIMA Assay for Neisseria gonorrhoeae using nucleic acid amplification for qualitative detection of N. gonorrhoeae rRNA in various specimen types including PreservCyt Solution-processed gynecological specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro qualitative detection of Neisseria gonorrhoeae ribosomal RNA in endocervical, vaginal, and male urethral swabs, and male/female urine, as well as PreservCyt Solution-processed gynecological specimens to aid in diagnosis of gonococcal urogenital disease.
